citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00 PM on 21-
June-2023.
The inspector arrived at the facility at 12:00 pm and spoke to the licensee over Facetime on a household member's
electronic device. The licensee stated that no adult was available for the inspection. The inspector then left the facility.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00 PM on 21-
June-2023. 
 
The inspector arrived at the facility at 12:00 pm and spoke to the licensee over Facetime on a household member's 
electronic device. The licensee stated that no adult was available for the inspection. The inspector then left the facility. 
 
 
End Section
